info.description: A modern Go application with RESTful API
info.title: Orris API

get.description: Get a paginated list of announcements with optional filters

post.description: Create a new announcement with the provided data

get.description: Get detailed information of an announcement by ID

put.description: Update an existing announcement by ID

post.description: Publish a draft announcement to make it visible to users

get.description: Check if the current user has a specific permission

parameters.description: Action name (e.g., create, read, update, delete)
parameters.name: action

post.description: Request a password reset email
Authenticate user with email and password, returns JWT tokens
Logout current user and invalidate session

get.description: Get current authenticated user information
Redirect to OAuth provider (google or github)
Handle OAuth provider callback and login/register user
Get all permissions for the current authenticated user

post.description: Get new access token using refresh token
Register a new user with email and password
Reset password with token from email

get.description: Get all roles assigned to the current authenticated user

post.description: Verify user email with token from email

parameters.description: Verification token (can also be in body)
parameters.name: token

get.description: Check if the service is healthy
Get a paginated list of node groups

post.description: Create a new node group with the input data

get.description: Get details of a node group by its ID

put.description: Update node group information by ID

delete.description: Delete a node group by ID

get.description: Get all nodes in a node group

post.description: Add a node to a node group

delete.description: Remove a node from a node group

post.description: Associate a subscription plan with a node group
post.summary: Associate subscription plan with node group

delete.description: Remove association between subscription plan and node group
delete.summary: Disassociate subscription plan from node group

404.description: Node group or plan not found

get.description: Get a paginated list of nodes

post.description: Create a new proxy node with the input data
Report node traffic and status data (requires node token)
Send heartbeat signal to indicate node is alive (requires node token)

get.description: Get details of a node by its ID

post.description: Activate a node by ID
Deactivate a node by ID
Generate a new API token for node authentication
post.summary: Generate new API token for node

get.description: Get traffic statistics for a node
Get a paginated list of notification templates

post.description: Create a new notification template
Render a notification template with provided variables

get.description: Get a list of notifications for the authenticated user

put.description: Mark all notifications as read for the authenticated user

get.description: Get the count of unread notifications for the authenticated user

delete.description: Delete a notification for the authenticated user

post.description: Archive a notification for the authenticated user

put.description: Mark a specific notification as read for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a paginated list of published announcements (public endpoint, no authentication required)
Get base64 encoded subscription by token
Get Clash format subscription by token
Get SIP008 format subscription by token (Shadowsocks)
Get Surge format subscription by token
Get V2Ray format subscription by token
Get a paginated list of subscription plans with optional filters

post.description: Create a new subscription plan with pricing and features

get.description: Get all publicly available subscription plans for display to potential customers
Get details of a specific subscription plan by its ID

put.description: Update an existing subscription plan's details

post.description: Activate a subscription plan to make it available for new subscriptions
Deactivate a subscription plan to prevent new subscriptions

get.description: Get a paginated list of subscriptions for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new subscription for the authenticated user with the specified plan

get.description: Get details of a specific subscription by its ID

post.description: Cancel an active subscription immediately or at the end of the billing period
Change the plan of an existing subscription (upgrade or downgrade)
Manually renew a subscription for the next billing period

get.description: Get all tokens associated with a subscription

post.description: Generate a new API token for a subscription with specified scope and expiration

delete.description: Revoke an existing subscription token to invalidate it

post.description: Refresh an existing subscription token to extend its validity

get.description: Get a paginated list of tickets

post.description: Create a new support ticket

get.description: Get details of a ticket

post.description: Assign a ticket to an agent
Close a ticket with a reason
Add a comment to a ticket

get.description: Get a paginated list of users

post.description: Create a new user with the input data

get.description: Get user details by email address
Get details of a user by their ID
Get all permissions for a specific user (based on their roles)
Get all roles assigned to a specific user

post.description: Assign one or more roles to a user (admin only)

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
Bearer.name: Authorization
